import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { fetchStudentById } from "../services/studentServices" export const StudentEditForm = () => { const [editStudent, setEditStudent] = useState({}) const { studentId } = useParams() const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchStudentById(studentId).then((data) => { setEditStudent(data) }) } const handleInput = (event) => { const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value const copy = { ...editStudent } copy[name] = value console.log("copy", copy) setEditStudent(copy) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, [studentId]) return (

Edit Student

) }
